Text.Name: LsDog
Text.Desc: Divine Dog Huajuan is a fantastic spiritual animal naturally occurring between heaven and earth. It is the manifestation of some rules of nature.

Text.Name: LsFox
Text.Desc: Spirit Fox Qinmuxue is a fantastic spiritual animal naturally occurring between heaven and earth. It is the manifestation of some rules of nature.

Text.Name: LsDragon
Text.Desc: Float Dragon Changhai is a fantastic spiritual animal naturally occurring between heaven and earth. It is the manifestation of some rules of nature.

Text.Name: LsPhoenix
Text.Desc: Dark Phoenix Yiming is a fantastic spiritual animal naturally occurring between heaven and earth. It is the manifestation of some rules of nature.
